## Water Quality Monitoring

::: {.modules-intro}
A series of lessons using AI to explore and monitor Appalachian water resources.  
*Designed for 9th-12th grade students.*
:::

:::
:::

::: {.lesson-outline}

### [Lesson 1: Statistics Fundamentals](1-statistics/)

Learn mean, median, range, standard deviation, and outliers using nitrate/nitrite data.

*Estimated time: 90 minutes*
